content: this classic beanie was made for a christmas gift for my brother-in-law you ll need appx 100-225yds of your favorite worsted weight yarn size 8 5mm circular and dpn needles a stitch marker and a yarn needle to weave in ends and close up the top you will need to know the knit purl ssk vdd and will need to know how to knit in the round the pattern comes in newborn baby toddler child small adult large adult permission is granted to sell what you make from the pattern you can purchase the yarn for this project here https //shrsl com/4buqp 1 download this free pattern here 2 1 https //shrsl com/4buqp 2 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-everyday-beanie-worsted/
